text: [Chapter 18a] [PSA Conventions Zone, Central Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: It seems we must go through this Xuirist camp to proceed.

speaker: left
text: Prepare for battle!
???: You there!
???: I can sense that you are a Proto-Xuir.
???: Do not be afraid, I am not here to harm you.
???: I am Xuirer, a traveling Xuirist.

speaker: right
text: However, the huntings of the Proto-Xuirs... I can't support it.

speaker: right
text: Why do we wish to wish to destroy what we worship?

speaker: right
text: The Proto-Xuirs should be worshipped, for the Xuirs are an extension of the True Xuir's power.

speaker: right
text: Holy Proto-Xuir, I wish to join you on your quest around the world.
[Recruit Xuirer?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: I pray for your victory, Proto-Xuir.
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: A camp in central Nolavillia has just been destroyed.

speaker: right
text: Destory them.

speaker: left
text: I will send troops out to surround them.

speaker: left
text: They'll have no escape, this is be far stronger the past battles.

speaker: right
text: It better be.

speaker: right
text: Remember, Omega...

speaker: right
text: If you fail, they will be destroyed.
